1.title: www vs non-www URL causing site not to login
1.text: I started noticing if I just type in my site without a "www" it goes to the site but i'm not logged in when I should be.  If I had a "www" and refresh - i'm logged in.  So it has something to do with the www vs non-www link - how can i stay logged in for either?
1.author: uReside.com

2.title: Re: www vs non-www URL causing site not to login
2.text: You should redirect all of your traffic to the proper domain be it www or non www, whatever is entered into the admincp
2.author: Zachery

3.title: Re: www vs non-www URL causing site not to login
3.text: You can do it either by .htaccess file or forward the url to the www in your server's control panel
